<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Riding Horse](/Monsters.aspx?ID=266)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 209</row>

**Perception** +5; low-light vision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +6, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +3

**Con** +4

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +6 

**Will** +5 

</row>

**HP** 22

**Buck** <actions string="Reaction" /> DC 16

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hoof +7,
**Damage** 1d6+4 bludgeoning

**Gallop** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The riding horse Strides twice. It has a +10-foot circumstance bonus to its Speed during these Strides.

</column>
